title: Sunday Post
additional-notes: This is a British publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

The earliest contribution renewal for the Sunday Post places it in London.  We are not aware of a 1937 London-based publication named the Sunday Post.  The Scotland-based Sunday Post published then and now, however, and had multiple editions, possibly including one for London.
